room.name: The Northwest End Of The Concourse
room.description: You are at the concourse, the city wall is just west. A small promenade goes east, and the bridge is just north of here. The concourse continues south along the city wall.

room.name: The Promenade
room.description: The river gently flows westwards just north of here. The promenade continues further east and to the west you see the city wall. Park Road leads south from here.

room.name: The Promenade
room.description: The river gently flows westwards just north of here. The promenade continues both east and west. South of here you see the entrance to the park, and a small building seems to be just west of the entrance.

room.name: The Promenade
room.description: The river gently flows westwards just north of here. The promenade continues both east and west. A small path leads south. Looking across the river you see the levee.

room.name: The Northeast End Of The Concourse
room.description: You are at the Concourse. The city wall is just east and a small promenade goes west. Looking across the river you see a building that resembles a warehouse. The Concourse continues south along the city wall.

extra_description.description: It is built from large grey rocks that have been fastened to each other with some kind of mortar. It is far too high to climb.

room.name: The Park Entrance
room.description: You are standing just inside the small park of Midgaard. To the north is the promenade and a small path leads south into the park. To your east is the famous Park Cafe.

room.name: Park Cafe
room.description: You are inside Park Cafe, a very cozy place with many tables and seats where you can relax and enjoy the view. To the east you can see the entrance to the park.

room.name: A Small Path In The Park
room.description: You are walking along a small path through the park. The path continues south and east.

room.name: A Small Path In The Park
room.description: You are standing on a small path inside the park. The park entrance is just north of here, and Park Cafe is just east of the entrance. The path leads further east and west.

direction.general_description: You see the northern park entrance.

room.name: A Small Path In The Park
room.description: You are on a small path running through the park. It continues west and south and just north of here you see the southern wall of Park Cafe.

room.name: Cityguard HeadQuarters
room.description: You are inside a tidy office.

room.name: Park Road
room.description: The road continues north and south. A building is just west of here, you notice a sign on the door. The park entrance is to the east.

extra_description.description:
The sign on the door says:
Cityguard HeadQuarters
WARNING: Authorized Personnel Only!

room.name: The Western Park Entrance
room.description: You are standing at the western end of the park. A small path leads east into the park and going west through the entrance you will reach Park Road.

room.name: A Path In The Park
room.description: You are in the park. The paths lead north and west. Westward is the park entrance and to the east you see a small pond.

direction.general_description: You see the western park entrance.

room.name: The Pond
room.description: You are swimming around in the pond, feeling rather stupid. You can get back on the path from the eastern and western end of the pond.

room.name: A Path In The Park
room.description: You are in the park. The paths lead north and east. Eastward is the park entrance and to the west you see a small pond.

room.name: The Eastern Park Entrance
room.description: You are standing at the eastern end of the park. A small path leads west into the park. Going east through the entrance you will reach Emerald Avenue.

room.name: Emerald Avenue
room.description: You are standing on the north end of Emerald Avenue. To the north is the promenade and to the west is the park entrance. To the east is the not very big Town Hall of Midgaard.

room.name: Park Road
room.description: You are on Park Road which leads north and south.

room.name: Emerald Avenue
room.description: You are standing at a bend on Emerald Avenue. The road leads north and west.

room.name: The Road Crossing
room.description: You are in the middle of the road cross. Roads lead in all directions. A huge black iron chain as thick as a tree trunk is fastened into the ground at the center of the road cross. Its other end leads directly upwards towards the sky. A road sign is here.

direction.general_description: The chain disappears in the clouds.

extra_description.description:
The sign points in all directions:
North - Emerald Avenue. East - Park Road. South - Emerald Avenue. West - Park Road.
Someone has added the following with red paint:
Up - Redferne's Flying Citadel.
The chain reaches the clouds high above you. It must take some really powerful magic to hold such a chain in place.

room.name: Emerald Avenue
room.description: You are standing at a bend on Emerald Avenue. The road leads south and east.

room.name: Park Road
room.description: You are on Park Road which leads south and north. Elm Street is east of here.

room.name: Elm Street
room.description: You are on Elm street. Park Road is to the west and Elm Street continues in eastward direction.

room.name: The End Of Elm Street
room.description: You are at the end of Elm Street.

room.name: Emerald Avenue
room.description: You are on Emerald Avenue which continues north. The Concourse is south of here.

room.name: Park Road
room.description: You are on Park Road which continues north. The Concourse is south of here.

room.name: On The Concourse
room.description: You are at the southwest corner of the city wall. The Concourse leads both north and east.

direction.general_description: Through the South Gate you can see a small path leading southwards.

room.name: On The Concourse
room.description: The Concourse continues both east and west. Emerald Avenue is north of here.

room.name: On The Concourse
room.description: The Concourse continues both east and west. Park Road is north of here and an iron grate leads south to the graveyard.

direction.general_description: Through the solid iron bars you see the graveyard.

room.name: On The Concourse
room.description: You are at the southeast corner of the city wall. The Concourse leads both north and west.

room.name: Park Road
room.description: You are at Park Road which continues north and south.

room.name: Emerald Avenue
room.description: You are at Emerald Avenue which continues north and south. Penny Lane leads east from here.

room.name: Emerald Avenue
room.description: You are standing at a bend on Emerald Avenue. To the east the road goes on and to the south is the Road Crossing.

room.name: Emerald Avenue
room.description: You are standing at a bend on Emerald Avenue. To the west the road goes on and to the north is the Road Crossing.

room.name: Park Road
room.description: You are at a bend on Park Road. To the north the road goes on and to the east is the Road Crossing.

room.name: Park Road
room.description: You are at a bend on Park Road. To the south the road goes on and to the west is the Road Crossing.

room.name: The Waiting Room
room.description: You are standing in the waiting room at the town hall. Wooden chairs stand along the walls and a long desk with a typewriter is placed in the middle of the room.

direction.general_description: It looks like some kind of office.
The exit west leads to Emerald Avenue.

extra_description.description: An extremely heavy desk. It is so large that it doesn't even need drawers. Everything can be stored on its top.
It is an ancient Quifatronic T-1000 mk I. These machines are known for their incredible durability, and for their even more incredible weight. They make a Cray II look like a laptop.

room.name: The Mayor's Office
room.description: You are in the not very big office of the Mayor of Midgaard. A large and polished but completely empty desk is standing in front of an armchair that looks so comfortable that it most of all resembles a bed with the head end raised slightly.

direction.general_description: The waiting room is to the west.

extra_description.description: This desk is obviously very old. Nevertheless it looks as if has never been used.

This chair is really a masterpiece. A chair where one can sit as comfortably as in a bed. All auditoriums should be equipped with these things. A shame that there wouldn't be room for the students too, though.

room.name: Penny Lane
room.description: You are on Penny Lane. Emerald Avenue is to the west and Penny Lane continues in eastward direction.

room.name: Penny Lane
room.description: You are on Penny Lane. The narrow road continues north and west.

room.name: The End Of Penny Lane
room.description: You are at the end of Penny Lane. The only exit appears to be south.

room.name: A Gravel Road In The Graveyard
room.description: You are on a well-kept gravel road that leads north-south through the graveyard. On both sides of the road grow dark evergreen trees. An iron grate is to the north.

direction.general_description: Through the solid iron bars you see the Concourse.

room.name: A Gravel Road In The Graveyard
room.description: You are on a well-kept gravel road that leads north-south through the graveyard. On both sides of the road grow dark evergreen trees.

room.name: A Gravel Road In The Graveyard
room.description: You are on a well-kept gravel road that leads north-south through the graveyard. On both sides of the road grow dark evergreen trees.

room.name: A Gravel Road In The Graveyard
room.description: You are on a well-kept gravel road that leads north-south through the graveyard. On both sides of the road grow dark evergreen trees.

direction.general_description: The gravel road continues southward to an open space before a small building.

room.name: In Front Of The Chapel
room.description: You are on an open space before a small chapel. A gravel road leads north through the graveyard and the chapel entrance is to the south.

direction.general_description: The chapel door is made of dark wood.

room.name: Inside The Chapel
room.description: You are in a small, dark chapel. The dark brown glass in the tiny windows do not let much light through. A few rows of worn wooden benches stand here and an ancient altar sits in the middle of the floor.

direction.general_description: The chapel door is made of dark wood.

extra_description.description: The windows must be meant to be dark. At least they are completely clean.

The altar looks very old... you examine the floor around the altar and notice that it seems less dusty than the rest of the room... someone must clean here regularly... maybe that old guy in Park Cafe, he looked like that sort...
The benches are not of the comfortable kind.

room.name: Under The Bridge
room.description: The arch under the bridge is covered by seaweed about a foot above the surface of the river. The water gently flows through an opening in the lower part of the city wall.

extra_description.description: It is built from large grey rocks that have been fastened to each other with some kind of mortar. Looks pretty solid.

room.name: On The River
room.description: North of here you see the miserable buildings of Poor Alley. The river flows west towards the bridge. The riverbanks are too steep to climb.

room.name: On The River
room.description: North of here you see the dump. The river flows from east to west. The riverbanks are too steep to climb.

room.name: On The River
room.description: The levee is directly north of here. The river flows in an east west direction.

room.name: On The River
room.description: You see the warehouse on the northern riverbank. East of here you see the city wall. The river flows west towards the levee.

room.name: On The River
room.description: The river enters from a hole in the eastern city wall. The hole has been blocked by several vertically positioned iron bars set into the wall.

direction.general_description: The iron bars make it difficult to pass through the hole in the wall. Beyond the bars you see that the river leads into a cavern below the mountain range to the east.
